subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Death in the Family "Experiment"!
author: Wiliam Clarke
full_text:
--0-1560950485-1208986655=:5349
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Everybody that wants to help with my Death in the Family "Experiment"  please post any evidence you might get!  Thanks for the help.
   
  If you get in touch with anybody please tell them I said "goodbye till I see ya again"!
   
  Thanks
  Rees

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
          Hi Rees

Sorry to hear of your loss. I will try for you.

Kay

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "reesclarke_69" <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> Hello guys, & gals
> 
> I hope everybody is having a great day, its a beatiful day in the 
> Bluegrass State of Kentucky. I just had a death in my Family, and 
I 
> was wandering if anybody does a session today/or tonight if you 
could 
> try to get in contact with a Mr. Charlie Clarke,(my Great Uncle) 
or 
> Mrs. Joann Clarke(his wife has past a couple of months ago)to see 
if 
> you can contact them. If you do contact him can you tell him that 
> Rees will be asking to speak with them tonight around 7-8pm 
eastern 
> time. To see if they can contact me. They lived a long and 
> wonderful life together. So all my family is sad to see him go, 
but 
> we know it was his time to leave, and life goes on. He should be 
> happy to be back with his wife. (He was 83 years old) I know 
> probaly somebody here might think this is crazy, dumb or 
> disrespectful, but that is my business. I think it should be easy 
to 
> get in contact with him since he just crossed over. Please let me 
> know if you tried and any evidence you might get from him.
> 
> Thanks
> 
> William Rees
>



                           

       
---------------------------------
